questions.question: What can you do with Computer Science?

choices.answer: Make your own app
Learn how computers work
Build a website
Create interactive art or games

questions.question: If you could make your own website or app, what would you make?

choices.answer: An app to help the world
A website to share things I like
A website to sell things and make money
A multiplayer game

questions.question: Which of these website ideas was a big success in the 1990s?

choices.answer: Frog facts
Hamsters dancing to music
Cats climbing trees
Animals imitating people

questions.question: Which of these successful companies / apps were created by computer science students?

choices.answer: SpitFire Athlete - training for female weightlifters
Summly - a news reading app
Gifs.com - an app to build and create your own gifs
The Crated - a smart fabric company

questions.question: What world problems have computer scientists helped solve?

choices.answer: Tracking the spread of diseases to prevent outbreaks
Predicting natural disasters such as earthquakes
Helping blind students read the internet
Translating languages so people can communicate
